front.title: AS-wide Unique BGP Identifier for BGP-4

abstract.t: To deal with situations where the current requirements for the BGPIdentifier are not met, this document relaxes the definition of theBGP Identifier to be a 4-octet unsigned, non-zero integer, andrelaxes the 'uniqueness' requirement so that only AS-wide uniquenessof the BGP Identifiers is required. These revisions to the base BGPspecification does not introduce any backward compatibility issue.
